data.name: Enjoy on your TV
data.description: Watch on smart TVs, PlayStation, Xbox, Chromecast, Apple TV, Blu-ray players and more.

data.name: Download your shows to watch offline
data.description: Save your favourites easily and always have something to watch.

data.name: Watch everywhere
data.description: Stream unlimited movies and TV shows on your phone, tablet, laptop and TV.

data.name: Create profiles for kids
data.description: Send kids on adventures with their favourite characters in a space made just for them — free with your membership.

faq.question: What is Netflix?
faq.answer: Netflix is a streaming service that offers a wide variety of award-winning TV shows, movies, anime, documentaries, and more on thousands of internet-connected devices. You can watch as much as you want, whenever you want, without a single ad – all for one low monthly price. There's always something new to discover, and new TV shows and movies are added every week!

faq.question: How much does Netflix cost?
faq.answer: Watch Netflix on your smartphone, tablet, Smart TV, laptop, or streaming device, all for one fixed monthly fee. Plans range from ₹149 to ₹649 a month. No extra costs, no contracts.

faq.question: Where can I watch?
faq.answer: Watch anywhere, anytime. Sign in with your Netflix account to watch instantly on the web at netflix.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device that offers the Netflix app, including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players, and game consoles.

faq.question: How do I cancel?
faq.answer: Netflix is flexible. There are no annoying contracts and no commitments. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees – start or stop your account anytime.

faq.question: What can I watch on Netflix?
faq.answer: Netflix has an extensive library of feature films, documentaries, TV shows, anime, award-winning Netflix originals, and more. Watch as much as you want, anytime you want.

faq.question: Is Netflix good for kids?
faq.answer: The Netflix Kids experience is included in your membership to give parents control while kids enjoy family-friendly TV shows and films in their own space.
